main.name: Ziyue Zhang
main.description2: I'm a Product Manager + Front-end Developer.
main.bio: I'm passionate about building beautiful products that users need -- whether that's by running A/B tests as part of a new feature launch or whipping up a new React Component from scratch. I'm working to make the world a more empathetic and connected place.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: My work experience has fostered a strong proficiency in Java and JavaScript-based languages, but my engineering education has provided me the fundamentals to pick up any language quickly. If you don't see a language here that you need, I'm always happy to learn something new!

education.school: The University of Texas at Austin
education.degree: Bachelors in Electrical and Computer Engineering
education.description: Graduated with High Honors and a 3.96 GPA with a concentration in Software Engineering. Acheived a minor in Business with a concentration in Marketing. Studied abroad at the University of Edinburgh, Scotland.

work.title: Lead Product Manager, Growth
work.description: Led areas of user acquisition and retention, platform support, international expansion, and external partner management. Proposed and executed data-driven strategy changes to improve user sentiment while cutting costs and managed a team of direct reports spanning functions across global operaitons, marketing, and program management.

work.title: Technical PM, Customer Operations
work.description: Developed features for a key pipeline and provided customer confidence to sign several multi-year contracts with Scale.

work.title: Product Manager, SAP on Azure
work.description: Shipped key security features and support capabilities to increase adoption rates of the Azure Backup for SAP product for Azure customers.

work.title: Software Engineer, M365 Security & Compliance
work.description: Developed the Microsoft365 Security & Compliance Common Controls, a suite of React components to improve UI consistency across all M365 S+C products. Completed UI components were integrated across 30% of the S+C platform within one month of release.

internships.title: Software Engineering Intern, O365 Security & Compliance
internships.description: Developed a method to seamlessly integrate complex React components into the existing Office 365 Security & Compliance portal written in AngularJS and TypeScript.

internships.title: Software Engineering Intern, Flickr
internships.description: Re-implemented the Flickr Production Engineering team's internal metrics monitoring dashboard using React to improve visualization, permit customization, and introducing standalone user alerts.

projects.title: ScreenX
projects.category: A cross-screen collaboration app made to integrate with Microsoft Teams.

projects.title: Fend
projects.category: Senior design project -- backpack security device with iOS App

projects.title: Innobond Technologies
projects.category: Website for a Chinese materials engineering startup

projects.title: Merge Mobile (for Microsoft Shuttles)
projects.category: Mobile app for shuttle booking on Microsoft Campus
